original_text: And he shall be like a tree planted by the rivers of water, that bringeth forth his fruit in his season; his leaf also shall not wither; and whatsoever he doeth shall prosper.
korean_text: 그는 시냇가에 심은 나무가 철을 따라 열매를 맺으며 그 잎사귀가 마르지 아니함 같으니 그가 하는 모든 일이 다 형통하리로다

sentences.original_text: And he shall be like a tree
planted by the rivers of water
that bringeth forth his fruit in his season
his leaf also shall not wither
and whatsoever he doeth shall prosper
